channel.title: Call to Action: Help S.M.I.L.E demonstrate the national interest
channel.description:
Please 1) respond to SMILE. ASAP - see below - it’s easy and only reflects our support and interest in them going forward - not an endorsement or commitment
2) blast this out to all interested in supporting modified ride on cars -- families, clinicians, community leaders etc. -- t
Thx a bunch ——————
"S.M.I.L.E. is a new nonprofit* organization that works in parallel with Go Baby Go to provide funding for mobility options like modified ride-on cars for children in need. This is truly AWESOME! Help them gauge interest by sending a simple email right now to members@smile-center.org Email Subject line: put "I am interested in SMILE" Email body: your contact information
Thanks soooo very much for your QUICK RESPONSE

item.title: Call to Action: Help S.M.I.L.E demonstrate the national interest
item.dc:creator: jacgallo
item.description:
Please

  1. respond to SMILE. ASAP - see below - it’s easy and only reflects our support and interest in them going forward - not an endorsement or commitment

  2. blast this out to all interested in supporting modified ride on cars – families, clinicians, community leaders etc. – t

Thx a bunch
——————

"S.M.I.L.E. is a new nonprofit* organization that works in parallel with Go Baby Go to provide funding for mobility options like modified ride-on
cars for children in need. This is truly AWESOME!
Help them gauge interest by sending a simple email right now to members@smile-center.org
Email Subject line: put “I am interested in SMILE”
Email body: your contact information

Thanks soooo very much for your QUICK RESPONSE
